title: Implement ID generation in Rust
description: Implement ids.rs with sha2 crate. Must generate identical IDs to Python for same inputs. Test with shared fixtures.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Goal: implement Rust issue ID generation with collision handling and unit tests matching Python behavior.

comments.author: Ryan Alyn Porter
comments.text: Implemented Rust ID generation with SHA256, collision handling, and tests. Added ids module, error variant, and dependencies. make check-rust passed.
